#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main()
{
   int t,s;
    unsigned long long int a,count=0;
    scanf("%i",&t);
    while(t>=1)
    {
        scanf("%llu",&a);
        if(a==0)
            {
                printf("18\n");
                goto here;
            }
        while(a!=0)
        {
            s=a%10;

            if(s==0)
            count+=18;
            if(s==1)
                count+=4;
            if(s==2)
                count+=10;
            if(s==3)
                count+=10;
            if(s==4)
                count+=8;
            if(s==5)
                count+=10;
            if(s==6)
                count+=18;
            if(s==7)
                count+=9;
            if(s==8)
                count+=21;
            if(s==9)
            count+=18;

            a=a/10;




        }
        printf("%llu\n",count);
        count=0;
        here:

        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
